title.zh: 长沙：第二届血友病患者服务工作交流合作论坛
title.en: Changsha: Second Hemophilia Patient Service Work Exchange and Cooperation Forum

subtitle.zh: 长沙血友病医学交流大会

description.zh: 第二届血友病患者服务工作交流合作论坛在长沙成功举办，由中南大学湘雅医院主办，益阳市友联罕见病关爱服务中心协办，东台市博爱罕见病助残关爱中心承办。左钰洁进行《女性血友病携带者和患者》科普宣讲，进一步推广女性血友病关爱理念。
description.en: The Second Hemophilia Patient Service Work Exchange and Cooperation Forum was successfully held in Changsha, hosted by Xiangya Hospital of Central South University, co-organized by Yiyang Youlian Rare Disease Care Service Center, and undertaken by Dongtai Boai Rare Disease Disability Care Center. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo gave a popular science presentation on 'Female Hemophilia Carriers and Patients', further promoting the concept of caring for women with hemophilia.

description.zh: 第二届血友病患者服务工作交流合作论坛现场，与会专家和患者代表认真参与讨论
description.en: Scene from the Second Hemophilia Patient Service Work Exchange and Cooperation Forum, with experts and patient representatives actively participating in discussions

description.zh: 左钰洁在论坛上进行《女性血友病携带者和患者》专题宣讲
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo presenting on 'Female Hemophilia Carriers and Patients' at the forum

title.zh: 微信公众号：论坛详细报道
